Posts.Content: Dec 23, 2014 04:17AM TylerTx wrote: I am in the waiting pattern as well. I am 38 and PCP wanted a baseline mammo before I turn 40. A mammo, a diagnostic mammo, an ultrasound and a 1 CM mass later, I have a core biopsy scheduled for Dec 29. I'm having the usual roller coaster of emotions. Try to stay positive and hang in there.
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammo, awaiting biopsy lovelynurse81 lovelynurse81
